Name: Daylight
About the game: You awake, trapped in an abandoned hospital. Your only source of light is your phone. You hit a dead-end and must turn around, but behind you lurks an eerie presence and strange noises... Experience Daylight, a procedurally generated psychological thriller for your PC. Unreal Engine 4 enhances the visuals of your escape to freedom like never before, heightening every bone-chilling detail of your surroundings. Get lost in a maze that changes with every playthrough, allowing for limitless replayability and the tension of unpredictability every time you start the game. Navigate to safety while avoiding what lurks in darkness. What will be waiting for you down the next corridor?
Meta Title: Daylight: Apr 29, 2014, Zombie Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Daylight? Check out the release date (Apr 29, 2014), developer insights from Zombie Studios, and a complete game summary.
